profile:
Our Story
CONCEPTION EMANUELO INCORPORATED·THURSDAY, JULY 4, 2019
Conception Emanuelo ...
 … Creative Concepts begin with Conception Emanuelo 
We would like to thank you for taking an interest in Conception Emanuelo. We have been doing business since 2009 providing quality flooring installation and repair services across Canada. You can be rest assured that we will do a great job and will be in and out of your home before you know it. Our workers are talented craftsmen who have been in the industry for years. Our promise to make this project a great experience for you is guaranteed.
Why choose us? 
Not only is our work highly sustainable but our workers are well mannered and will treat your home and family with the utmost care and respect. We can install all types of floors and are experts on the topic; Hardwood Flooring, Laminate, Ceramic Tile, Floating, Engineered, Engineered Hardwood, Vinyl Sheet, Carpet. Over the course of 12 years we've been following a simple and straightforward process that helps to get the job done right. 
We will provide a FREE FLOORING ESTIMATE We will come to your property and take measurements discussing possible options free of charge. Our installation/repair process will be discussed with the homeowner on individual basis due to the various types of flooring. Each floor or wall covering will be installed/repaired per manufacturer guidelines. Please keep in mind that the flooring material is under a different warranty than the workmanship. 
We offer standard 2 year warranty on workmanship. Our workers will ensure not to disturb or destroy any surrounding property on the premises. Our workers clean up on a daily basis and are sure to leave your residence clean. When the work is completed, our workers do a stand up job removing garbage and debris, leaving your home spotless. We provide and type of flooring such as ceramic tiles, hardwood, laminate, vinyl planks, vinyl, and carpet tile, slate, marble, granite along with the appropriate subfloor wire mesh or plywood if needed. 
We also specialize in backslash, tub surrounds, fireplaces, bathroom reno and showers, steam and waterproof, dry pack as shower floor is available. We also remove old gypsum boards or reinstall new gypsum or cement boards. We provide full grout clean up and small repairs for any type of flooring. Any other type of different tasks such as removal of old flooring or any other type of need such as plumbing or patching or debris will all subject to arise the quote. Tile Baseboard also available. We usually include the setting materials and subfloor materials in the prices due to we offer discounted material to make your quote affordable. To purchase flooring products and material only we offer unbeatable prices straight from the source. 
We work with dignity and pride always on time and affordable.
